title: virtual backbone
extract: Virtual backbone trees have been used for efficient communication between sink node and any other node in the deployed area. But all the proposed virtual backbone trees are not fully energy efficient and EVBTs have few flaws associated with them. In this paper two such virtual backbones are proposed.
extract_html: Virtual backbone trees have been used for efficient communication between sink node and any other node in the deployed area. But all the proposed virtual backbone trees are not fully energy efficient and EVBTs have few flaws associated with them. In this paper two such virtual backbones are proposed.
